name: goldenrod
content:

a plant with groups of small yellow flowers that grow along the stems of the plant, sometimes used as a herb to treat medical conditions: Plant goldenrod to attract butterflies and flying insects. Goldenrods are essentially plants of the prairie or woodland edge.
More examplesFewer examplesGoldenrod is particularly striking now with its long clusters of golden-yellow flowers.Vast fields of goldenrod dominated the landscape each spring.Goldenrods are, in some places, held as a sign of good luck or good fortune.
